title: Linear Algebra
description: Finite dimensional vector spaces, inner product spaces, least squares, linear transformations, the spectral theorem for normal transformations.  Applications to convex sets, positive matrices, difference equations.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 1502 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1512 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1504 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1555 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ((MATH 1552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 15X2 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (MATH 1553 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1554 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1564 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1522 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X53 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T))
